  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bios_es_20070518_3_0030400</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bios_es_20070518_3_0030400</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Clasificación de los organismos</string>
            <string language="en">Classification of organisms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassifikation der organismen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Classification des organizations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Classificação dos organismos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Classificazione degli organismi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξινόμηση των οργανισμών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Tema que trata sobre la taxonomía y clasifica los organismos en los cinco reinos de la clasificación de Margulis, profundizando en la organización del reino Plantas y Animales.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic dealing with taxonomy and classifies organisms into five kingdoms according to Margulis's classification, with special emphasis on the organization of the plant and animal kingdoms.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Thema, das Taxonomie beschäftigt und stuft 
organismen in fünf Königreiche entsprechend Klassifikation 
Marguliss, mit besonderer Betonung auf der Organisation der Betriebs- 
und Tierkönigreiche ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le sujet traitant la taxonomie et classifie des 
organizations dans cinq royaumes selon la classification de Margulis, 
avec la considération particulière sur l'organisation des royaumes 
d'usine et d'animal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O tópico que trata do taxonomy e classifica 
organismos em cinco reinos de acordo com a classificação de 
Margulis, com ênfase especial na organização dos reinos da planta e
do animal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il soggetto che si occupa della tassonomia e 
classifica gli organismi in cinque regni secondo la classificazione 
del Margulis, con importanza particolare sull'organizzazione dei regni
dell'animale e della pianta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το θέμα που εξετάζει την ταξονομία και ταξινομεί τους 
οργανισμούς σε πέντε βασίλεια σύμφωνα με την ταξινόμηση 
Margulis, με ιδιαίτερη έμφαση σε οργάνωση των εγκαταστάσεων και
των ζωικών βασίλειων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
